## FieldInfo interface

Descrpitor of a field that comes from the database (e.g. `SELECT` query result set).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FieldInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buffer](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.buffer.md) | <code>() =&gt; Buffer &#124; null</code> | Function for getting the field binary value. |
|  [db](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.db.md) | <code>string</code> | Database name or empty string. |
|  [geometry](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.geometry.md) | <code>() =&gt; GeometryValue &#124; null</code> | Function for getting the field geometry value. |
|  [length](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.length.md) | <code>number</code> | Value field width in bytes. |
|  [name](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.name.md) | <code>string</code> | Column name (alias) or empty string. |
|  [string](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.string.md) | <code>() =&gt; string &#124; null</code> | Function for getting the field string value. |
|  [table](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.table.md) | <code>string</code> | Table name (alias) or empty string. |
|  [type](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.type.md) | <code>ValueType</code> | Value type. |
